response.overview: When the wealthy CEO, Eric Brown, finds himself in need of an heir within a year, he strikes a deal with kind-hearted waitress Nora Clark for a marriage of convenience and artificial insemination. But as they spend more time together, their connection deepens into a passionate love they never anticipated. Meanwhile, Ericâ€™s scheming bastard brother plots to seize both the company and the child by exposing dark family secrets. Now, Eric and Nora must fight for their inheritance and the love and family they never expected.
response.title: Rush Into Love
